divs: Sighting DetailsFishing a qurter mile away from Fermi 2 Nuclear plant in Lake Erie at Point Mouliee and Corp of Engineers man made peninsula at end of Peninsula in the woods is a pond or small lake next to the big lake Erie. Me and my friend were catfishing when my friend needed light to put the night crawler on his hook. I went to light up my flashlight and then his hook and the bait suddenly lit up. He started baiting his hook and I knew it wasnt my flashlight because I did not turn it on. I looked over my shoulder and seen this cylindrical bright light rise from the pond and hover above us. I told Jimmy my friend to look and he got startled. I asked him what it was and he said he didnt know. Then it sped off across Lake Erie at a tremendously fast rate. It had know sound at it was hovering about 250 ft. above us. Since that occurence I have returned to fish at the sight and they now have no trespassing signs saying its a bird sanctuary and they have security guards posted at entrance. I told my wife and children about this when I came home and they laughed at me and Jimmy. So I dont talk much about it. Funny thing is this is the second time I have had encounters of this type, I just dont want to get into the other encounter. If you want a place to investigate this is the place.
